article_title: How To Fight Acne With Diet
article_text:
Skin care

20 Things You Never Knew About Botox

With the influx of new skin-care procedures, treatments, and products that has hit the market in recent years, one has truly lasted the test of time — 14 years, to be exact — and it seems to be getting even more popular. You've heard of it. Everyone has heard of it. It's called Botulinum toxin, a.k.a. Botox. Maybe ...

Megan Cahn

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Annet King
article_metadata.description: Dermalogica's Annet King schools us on the importance of diet on the skin.

og.description: As Dermalogica's in-house skin care guru (oh, and their Director of Global Education), Annet King is an invaluable trove of beauty know-how.
